name: Bob Sleddaz
description:
A showdown of the ages between human and Yeti is happening in the arctic. Drift your way around the arena and bump to victory on your Bob-Sled! Perhaps enjoy some whale-watching while you're at it...

Tools
  • Unity
    • FMOD
  • Blender
  • Photoshop
